title: Disconnecting in loading screen
body: Hi guys i just wondered if anyone has a fix for the problem ive been experiencing for the last few months. I can use the launcher and search for a game fine. but as soon as i get through champ select it will disconnect me in that loading screen (the one with the percentages) with the error message ("you have been disconnected, please check your internet connection and try again"). As soon as the game starts i can load in just fine (if im playing with people they tell me when to connect) but its really intrusive and annoying especially if i want to stream! any help would be much appreciated.

replies.body: That loading screen has a couple new connection that your network needs to make to start loading everything for the game to begin, and sometimes firewalls/antivirus can block those connections for some odd reasons. Try adjusting those two settings, there are some guiding steps for that listed in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) we sometimes use if you need help too!
As i commented below. i have already followed the steps on that page and it still doesnt work.

Still good to give those steps a try to make sure we're covering all the possibilities instead of missing something simple of course! Since it isn't something like firewalls blocking your network from keeping a stable signal with our servers, go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Be sure to send them your game logs, which you can generate using the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), so they can see exactly what's going on when the game starts
